price: А кад је твој Господар позвао Мојсија: „Иди насилничком народу,
arabic: وَإِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئۡتِ ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-idh nādā rabbuka mūsā ani i'ti al-qawma al-ẓālimīna
